item.title: Week 6: Inference
item.description: Monday Normal Distribution Statistical Errors Reading Chapter 2, p. 85-107 Tuesday Lab 7: Inference for Catagorical Data Wednesday Hypothesis Tests Review Practice Slides Friday Sampling Distribution Confidence Intervals The Bootstrap Slides

item.title: Week 6: Foundations of Inference II
item.description: Monday Foundations of Inference: An Analogy Reading Chapter 2, p. 72-85 Slides Tuesday Lab 6: The Building Blocks of Inference Wednesday Approximating the Null Distribution Central Limit Theorem Friday Infer Package Overview Midterm 1

item.title: Week 5: Foundations of Inference
item.description: Monday Foundations of Inference: Mythbusters Reading Chapter 2, p. 61-72 Tuesday Lab 5: Benford’s Law Wednesday Lab 5 Questions Hypothesis Testing via Randomization Friday Hypothesis Testing (Continued) Slides

item.title: Week 4: Random Variables
item.description: Monday Random Variables Reading Appendix A, p. 315 - 323 HW 4. - Due next Monday Tuesday Data Wrangling Wednesday Random Variables (continued) Fundamental Probability Distributions Bernoulli Trials dplyr Reading Appendix A, p. 315 - 323 Friday Fundamental Probability Distributions Binomial Distribution Quiz 2

item.title: Week 3: Probability Foundations
item.description: Monday Pobability Foundations (continued) Outcomes and Events Reading Appendix A, p. 295-306 HW 3 - Due next Monday Tuesday Lab 3: Visualization Wednesday Pobability Foundations (continued) Honest and Thief Simulation Reading Appendix A, p. 306-316 Friday Pobability Foundations (continued) Conditional Probability Reading Appendix A, p. 306-316

item.title: Week 2: Describing Data
item.description: Monday Describing Data - Graphical Example Plots in R Reading p. 19-30 HW 2: Due next Monday MTH-141 Suvey Tuesday Lab 2: Sampling Wednesday Describing Data - Numerical Reading p. 19-30 Slides Data Camp: Exploratory Data Analysis Friday Probability Foundations Quiz Reading Appendix A, p. 295-306

item.title: Week 1: Intro to Data
item.description: Monday Taxonomy of Data Reading p. 1-8 HW 1: Due next Monday MTH-141 Suvey Data Camp: Introduction to R Tuesday Lab 1 due Thursday at 11:59 pm Wednesday Data Collection for Inference Reading p. 9-16 Slides Friday Study Design Experiments Observational Studies Slides
